#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int x;
    float y;
    cin>>x>>y;

    if((float)x <= y)
    {
        if(x%5==0)
        {
            float bal;
            bal = y - (float)x -0.5;
            //cout<<bal<<endl;
            printf("%.2f\n",bal);
        }

        else
        {
            //cout<<y<<endl;
            printf("%.2f\n",y);
        }
    }

    else
        //cout<<y<<endl;
        printf("%.2f\n",y);
}
